txt.en: The effects of your critical hits inspire those around you, giving them the motivation needed to continue the fight.

#1:[placeholder]: While utilizing the Rohirrim Discipline the following skills have chance to restore 10% of Morale and 10% of Steed Endurance to you and your fellowship (within 40m): #1:{None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Jollification, All in the Wrist[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, Rider and Steed[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Bond of the Rider, Sign of Power: Inspiration[L]|Hammer of the Rohirrim, Ballad: Chant, Cry of the Rohirrim, Anthem of the Rohirrim, Coda of the Rohirrim[I]|Fixation of Health, Ameliorating Oration, Debate the People, Resolution of Enduring Life[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas, Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Slash, Recuperate, Ferocious Roar[B]| Strike, Mocking Taunt, Take a Breath[R]|Quick Strike, The Field of Celebrant[O]}
